snippet.title: MSX Longplay [005] Valis: The Fantasm Soldier
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Valis77

Have you ever wondered where i got my name from? This is the original Valis back in 1986 also making this one of the first games to star a female lead. You are a schoolgirl name Yuko Ahso who wields a magic sword (Valis) killing monsters that wants to take  over the world of reality and dreamland.

9:05 Skip the health/Level grind

16:46 Stage 2

22:45 Stage 3

28:13 Stage 4

41:42 Stage 5

51:06 Final Battle -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
